body:
You should look at these discussions [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/initial-documentation-of-thermal-maps) and [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/problem-displaying-annual-indoor-comfort-metrics?groupUrl=ladybug&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1225443&page=2#comments).

-A.
